official_title: Examining a Fast Movement Approach to Pediatric Therapy Intervention in Children and Adolescents That Have Completed Medical Treatment for Acute Lymphoblastic Leukemia
inclusion_criteria:
* Children 6-17 years old
* Completed medical treatment for ALL within the past five years (1 to 60 months)
* Speak English.
Healthy volunteers allowed
Must have minimum age of 6 Years
Must have maximum age of 17 Years
exclusion_criteria:
* Diagnosis of a neurological disorder such as cerebral palsy, Down syndrome
* Currently receiving PT services.
